mapper.sql: id, roomid, roomtypeid, hotelid, score, createtime, orderid, grade, hotelscore, servicescore, isreply, isaduit, hotelscoretime, servicescoretime, isvisible, status, type, parentID, mid, USER_CODE, USER_NAME, isdefault, iscashbacked, backcashcost
mapper.select: SELECT a.hotelid, COUNT(a.id) AS scorecount, b.s AS grade FROM t_hotel_score a LEFT JOIN t_hotel_subject b ON a.hotelid = b.hotelid WHERE a.hotelid = #{hotelid} AND a.type = 1 AND a.status = 4 ;
